name: ATTTrackingHelper
description: TrackingHelper is an AOP based analytics helper that will help to simplify the use of different analytics agents based on a configuration json. The library includes a set of classes with an example configuration file that can be added to the source project. The library works on the basis of Notification pattern, that will help the middleware helper class to listen to the screen changes and actions notifications automatically. In additions to that, the helper will help to trigger manual notifications whose parameters can be configured in the configuration file which is added locally or in the form of dictionary.
